name: Ultimate Boss Battle of Doom
description:
NOTE: WEB VERSION DOES NOT WORK PROPERLY IN CHROME (FIREFOX RECOMMENDED) How to play

Defeat the big bad guy and his minions by jumping on bombs and stuff.

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • SPACE to Jump
Tools Used
  • Godot Game Engine
  • Photoshop & Aseprite
  • Bfxr & Audacity
Development Timelapse
